snippet: Major League Soccer wants to add its 20th team in New York, at a 25,000-seat stadium on city parkland.
abstract: Major League Soccer, at town hall meeting hosted in Queens, NY, presents its plan to add a 20th team and new stadium to the borough by 2016.
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer wants to add its 20th team in New York, at a 25,000-seat stadium on city parkland.

headline.seo: At Town Hall Meeting, M.L.S. Makes a Case for a Stadium in Queens
headline.main: M.L.S. Promotes Stadium at a Town Hall Meeting
headline.print_headline: M.L.S. Promotes Stadium at a Town Hall Meeting
